revised_title: The Skeletal Development and Transformation in Marsipohranch Fishes
tldr: This study examines the skeletal development and transformation in Marsipohranch fishes, focusing on the Lamprey species. The research describes various stages of the Lamprey's skeleton, from the adult form to the early embryo and larval forms, providing insights into the unique skeletal structure and metamorphosis process of these fish.
